title: Im stuck on honour lvl 2
body: It has been like this since honor started. What I am really mad about is the fact that I am not able to create a PBE account because of this. My level 23 friend has honor lvl 5 yet I am lvl 2. This doesnt make sense and Im hoping if a mod could go over my account and tell me if its a glitch or how long I have to get to lvl 3.

replies.body: So far there have been no bugs with getting honor.  I looked into this for you, and see that your honor gain might not necessarily be at a rapid rate as a result of less than honorable behavior.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our PB team can get you more context so you can ramp up your honor gains again.
